relevant_findings.general: Patient appears well, reclined in bed.
relevant_findings.heent: PERRL, EOMI, slightly dry mucosal membranes, oropharynx clear.
relevant_findings.respiratory: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, no wheezes, rales, or rhonchi.
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm, II/VI systolic ejection murmur, normal S1 S2, JVP < 7 cm.
relevant_findings.abdominal: Normal bowel sounds, slightly distended, tenderness to palpation in lower and epigastric areas, no RUQ pain, no rebound or guarding.
relevant_findings.extremities: Warm, well perfused, no clubbing or edema, 2+ pulses.
relevant_findings.neurological: Alert and oriented to person, place, and time.
